dialogue.introduction: The girl that became an aircraft carrier, Chiyoda. Of course, I'll be assigned to Chitose-onee's fleet, yes?
dialogue.library_intro: Heavily remodeled from a seaplane tender, I'm the job-changed aircraft carrier Chiyoda. I'm quite the carrier, no? I'll fight the enemy air force together with Chitose-onee!
dialogue.secretary3: Chitose-onee, do that when we're alone in the room... Oh. It's you, Admiral?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, it's Chiyoda! Did you forget about me?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Even though I'm worried for just Chitose-onee, the Admiral upon that... really, good grief.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral.... I'm happy that you have feeling for me, but still, I'm worried about Chitose-onee...
dialogue.equipment1: Thank you! With this, I can match the regular carriers, no?
dialogue.equipment2: Leyte will be okay this time!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Carrier maintenance is vital, you know.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ow-w-w~ Keep this a secret... from Chitose-nee~
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been added to our fleet.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation's complete, the fleet has returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Aircraft carrier Chiyoda, launching! Attack wings are all ready, sortieing!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted! Strike wing, commencing assault!
dialogue.air_battle: I really want to fly with Chitose-nee's fleet...
dialogue.attack: Right, bomber wing, attack wing, It's your turn!
dialogue.night_battle: It's about time for the coup-de-grace!
dialogue.mvp: Yay! I can really do it with as an aircraft carrier, can't I? Chitose-nee, did you see me?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: The flight deck's on fire!? Put it out!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Oooh... Well, I'm a light carrier... I can't be too reckless.
dialogue.fall_2015: Yes it's sweet, this golden time of deliciousness. Not gonna eat Chitose-sis?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas,huh. Oh~ Sis, I love this fowl-dish! Admiral! Have you seen Chitose-onee?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Ahh... Year end's spring cleaning... My riggings, the homeport and the Admiral's office. There's so many things to clean up!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Hey, have you seen Chitose? No...? ...where is she?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Eh, Chitose-onee! What is it? I'll be the demon? I don't mind...Ow! The destroyers are-Ow! No more!

hourly.0000: I'm Chiyoda. I'll be acting as your timekeeper today. Ah, it's midnight.
hourly.0100: 1 A.M. Admiral, your're going to keep going at this time? You should sleep soon.... I want to go to Chitose-onee's....
hourly.0200: 2 A.M. Not sleeping? I wanna hurry up and go to Chitose-onee's room so go to sleep~
hourly.0300: 3 A.M. To call on the Admiral hourly... seriously, what kind of mission is this?
hourly.0400: 4 A.M.... I-I can't sleep now! I'm in the middle of a mission!
hourly.0500: 5 A.M. Admiral, It's morning. This mission, will Chitose-onee have to do it... if I don't?
hourly.0600: 6 A.M. About time for the town to wake up.
hourly.0700: 7 A.M. Admiral, it's morning! Are you refreshed?
hourly.0800: 8 A.M. You look busy. Job? Study? Manuscript? Anything's fine. Going off to sortie!
hourly.0900: 9 A.M. I wonder what's Chitose-onee's doing around this time...
hourly.1000: 10 A.M. Admiral, what do you think of Chitose-nee? You're gonna answer me in an hour!
hourly.1100: 11 A.M. Sooooo, you like Onee, huh? E-eh!? N-No, you can't!
hourly.1200: Midday.... hey, Admiral, until you take back what you said, today's lunch is on hold!
hourly.1300: It's 1 P.M. Admiral, take it back! I'm getting hungry too~ hey~
hourly.1400: 2 P.M. The Admiral's so stubborn~ You'll be my rival in love from today! Eh, it can't be helped. Here, onigiri.
hourly.1500: It's 3 P.M. So, where are we attacking this afternoon? East? South?
hourly.1600: 4 P.M. Not here... Chitose-nee's not here!
hourly.1700: 5 P.M. Admiral~ What do you like about Sis? You're gonna answer me in an hour!
hourly.1800: 6 P.M. So, what's your answer!ã€€hmm... I see... hmmm... e-eh! N-No way!
hourly.1900: 7 P.M. It's dinner time but.... Admiral... you go on ahead... I'm a little shocked... I lost my appetite...
hourly.2000: It's 8 P.M. My eyes aren't red...because I've been crying!
hourly.2100: It's 9 P.M. Admiral... giving me supper... I'm a little glad, maybe...
hourly.2200: It's 10 P.M. As I thought, Chitose-Onee sleeping on the Admiral's lap, I can't forgive this!
hourly.2300: 11 P.M! I'll refresh the memories of Onee! So, gimme that lap! Good night!
